python_intro.title: Introduction to Python Programming
python_intro.content: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its simplicity and readability. It was created by Guido van Rossum and first released in 1991.

python_advanced.title: Advanced Python Concepts
python_advanced.content: Advanced Python features include decorators, metaclasses, async programming, and performance optimization techniques. These concepts enable sophisticated software architecture patterns.

quantum_computing_intro.title: Introduction to Quantum Computing
quantum_computing_intro.content: Quantum computing leverages quantum mechanical phenomena like superposition and entanglement to process information. Unlike classical bits, quantum bits (qubits) can exist in multiple states simultaneously.

quantum_algorithms.title: Quantum Algorithms and Applications
quantum_algorithms.content: Key quantum algorithms include Shor's algorithm for factoring, Grover's search algorithm, and variational quantum eigensolvers. These algorithms demonstrate quantum advantage over classical computing.

quantum_applications.title: Real-World Quantum Computing Applications
quantum_applications.content: Quantum computing applications span drug discovery, financial modeling, optimization problems, and machine learning. Current NISQ devices show promise for near-term applications.

machine_learning_basics.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
machine_learning_basics.content: Machine learning enables computers to learn patterns from data without explicit programming. Key categories include supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and reinforcement learning.

deep_learning.title: Deep Learning and Neural Networks
deep_learning.content: Deep learning uses multi-layered neural networks to learn complex patterns. Applications include computer vision, natural language processing, and generative AI.

quantum_machine_learning.title: Quantum Machine Learning
quantum_machine_learning.content: Quantum machine learning combines quantum computing with ML algorithms. Potential advantages include exponential speedups for certain problems and novel optimization landscapes.

web_development.title: Modern Web Development
web_development.content: Web development involves creating applications that run in web browsers. Modern frameworks like React, Vue, and Angular enable sophisticated user interfaces.

data_science_basics.title: Data Science Fundamentals
data_science_basics.content: Data science combines statistics, programming, and domain knowledge to extract insights from data. Key tools include Python, R, SQL, and visualization libraries.

distributed_systems.title: Distributed Systems Architecture
distributed_systems.content: Distributed systems involve multiple computers working together to solve problems. Key challenges include consistency, availability, and partition tolerance (CAP theorem).

software_engineering.title: Software Engineering Principles
software_engineering.content: Software engineering encompasses the systematic approach to designing, developing, and maintaining software systems. Key principles include modularity, abstraction, and testing.

graph_metadata.description: Sample hierarchical document graph for demonstration of traversal algorithms
